title: How F1's flexi-wing clampdown works and what effect it will have
summary: Will the front wing flexibility clampdown introduced at the Spanish GP be a reset of Formula 1's competitive order?

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the front wing flexibility clampdown in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To ensure that front wings comply with stricter regulations on flexibility for fair competition.
wrong_options: To increase downforce for all teams.
To reduce drag on the cars.
To allow teams more freedom in wing design.

qa_pairs.question: Which Grand Prix was the front wing flexibility clampdown introduced at?
How might the front wing flexibility clampdown affect the competitive order in F1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It could level the playing field by reducing performance advantages of teams that exploited flexible wings.
wrong_options: It will likely increase the performance gap between teams.
It will have no effect on team dynamics.
It will only benefit the top teams.
